author: Ted Byrne
content:
Ahhh Worms. Home of the banditizing of Luther. Somehow it's hard to think of Lutherans as early gangstas.... Today, they'd make a bundle doing rap. Which is why I can't understand why you chose jazz over some cut from the hood.

It's right though to picture Worms in the face of a gathering storm. It would have made Holy Roman Emp Chucky FIVE feel just right, no?

The portension you've captured rocks... or is that raps?
